sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个形容词均有"有效的"之意。
means: effective ： 侧重产生实际的效果、效力或具有取得预期效果的能力，指人指物都适用。
efficient ： 侧重指积极有效，效率高，效果好，节省精力。指人时，强调其能干、熟练的技巧。

sentence.Network_en: Condoms are an effective method of birth control if used with care.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果使用得当，避孕套是很有效的避孕手段。

sentence.Network_en: Light colours provide an effective backdrop for pictures or a mirror.
sentence.Network_cn: 浅色是挂放图画或镜子很有效果的衬托。

sentence.Network_en: Women are sometimes seen to be less effective as managers.
sentence.Network_cn: 女性有时被认为不善于管理。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 有效率(efficiency)的分配时间与有效(effective)的达成目标才能一一实现各种琳琅满目的愿望，时间管理诚可谓迈向成功的第一步。
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... effect v 实施；生效；效果 effective v 有效的 effectuate v 使…有效.
3.走路很有效率（EFFECTIVE）。如果一个人走路的速度达到100米/分钟时，1小时所消耗的热量即可达到500卡路里。
2013考研英语高频词汇_百度文库 ... edible 可食的，无毒的 effective 有效果的 efficient 有效率的.

list.abs: 其中提到了有效地 ( effectively ) 两次，很明显的，Mozilla 很希望藉由 Bugzilla 来帮助所有人”有效地”完成的软体开发工作。所以，每 …
效能(EFFECTIVENESS)与效率(EFFICIENCY)引入DiE时, 我们会注重两个范畴。
（1）有效性（effectiveness）（Effectiveness）——是指信息与商业过程相关，并以及时、准确、一致和可行的方式传送。（2）高效性（Efficiency）…
字典中干字的解释 ... (3) 引申为本质[ essenee] (5) 效果;用处[ effect] (6) 地位低下的官吏[ low official].
3d max 中英文对照 - 小M的日志 - 网易博客 ... Editable Poly 可编辑多边形 Effect 影响；效果；特效 Effects 效果；影响；特效.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin effectivus, from efficere 'work out, accomplish' (see effect)

entry.tran: 有效的;能产生预期效果的
entry.def: Something that is effective works well and produces the results that were intended.

example.ex: The project looks at how we could be more effective in encouraging students to enter teacher training...
example.tran: 该项目着眼于我们如何能够更加有效地鼓励学生参与教师培训。

example.ex: Simple antibiotics are effective against this organism...
example.tran: 一般的抗生素能够有效对抗这种微生物。

entry.def: Effective means having a particular role or result in practice, though not officially or in theory.

example.ex: They have had effective control of the area since the security forces left.
example.tran: 自从安全部队撤离后，他们实际上控制了该地区。

example.ex: ...a restructuring that would have resulted in an effective increase on one of their most popular excursion fares.
example.tran: 原本会使他们最热门的一条短途旅游线路的费用出现实质性上涨的调整

entry.tran: （法律、协议等）生效的，起作用的
entry.def: When something such as a law or an agreement becomes effective, it begins officially to apply or be valid.

example.ex: The new rules will become effective in the next few days.
example.tran: 新规定将在几天后生效。

means.word_mean: 1. producing or capable of producing an intended result or having a striking effect;

sentences.sentence: "an air-cooled motor was more effective than a witch's broomstick for rapid long-distance transportation"-LewisMumford
"his complaint proved to be effectual in bringing action"

means.word_mean: 2. able to accomplish a purpose; functioning effectively;

sentences.sentence: "people who will do nothing unless they get something out of it for themselves are often highly effective persons..."-G.B.Shaw

means.word_mean: 3. works well as a means or remedy;

sentences.sentence: "a lotion that is effective in cases of prickly heat"
"the law is already in effect (or in force)"

means.word_mean: 5. existing in fact; not theoretical; real;

sentences.sentence: "confused increased equipment and expenditure with the quantity of effective work done"
"the fort was held by about 100 effective soldiers"

auth_sentence.content: Their use of stereo is simple but very effective.
auth_sentence.res_content: Their use of stereo is simple but very effective.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Their use of stereo is simple but very effective.

auth_sentence.content: It can be very effective in melting snow quickly.
auth_sentence.res_content: It can be very effective in melting snow quickly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It can be very effective in melting snow quickly.

auth_sentence.content: How effective are the psychological skills used by sportspeople?
auth_sentence.res_content: How effective are the psychological skills used by sportspeople?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: How effective are the psychological skills used by sportspeople?

stems_affixes.value_cn: 受到影响的,不自然的,假装的
stems_affixes.word_buile: affect[v.影响;[疾病]侵袭;感动 n.情感,感情]+ed……的→被影响的
affection[n.爱,喜爱;爱慕之情;感情;疾病,不适]+ate……的→adj.挚爱的,充满感情的
affect情感+ive……的→adj.情感的,表达感情的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有效的,生效的;被实施的;给人深刻印象
stems_affixes.word_buile: effect[n.结果;效果;影响;印象 v.招致;实现;达到]+ive……的→adj.有效的,生效的;被实施的;给人深刻印象

stems_affixes.value_cn: 传染的,传染性的,有感染力的
stems_affixes.word_buile: infect传染+ious……的→adj.传染的,传染性的,有感染力的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 完善的;完全的;[语法]完成的
stems_affixes.word_buile: per全部+fect做,制作→全部做完→完善的
disaffect[v.使不满意,使疏远]+ed……的→adj.[政治上]不满的,叛离的
af使+fect做,制作→使……做→影响

stems_affixes.value_cn: 爱,喜爱;爱慕之情;感情;疾病,不适
stems_affixes.word_buile: affect[v.影响;[疾病]侵袭;感动 n.情感,感情]+ion表名词→n.爱,喜爱;爱慕之情;感情;疾病,不适
con共同+fect做,制作→很多[果子,甜品]加在一起做→调制[出糖果]
confect[v.调制,n.西点,糖果]+ion某种物→n.甜食,糖果

stems_affixes.value_cn: 糖果制造人, 糖果店
stems_affixes.word_buile: confection[n.甜食,糖果]+ery场所→n.糖果制造人, 糖果店
de坏+fect做,制作→做坏了→缺陷
de坏+fect做+ion表名词→做坏事
affect感动+ation表名词→做出的感动→做作
ef出+fect做,制作→做出来→出效果
infect[v.传染,感染;影响[思想等]]+ion状态→n.感染,传染;传染病
perfect[adj.完善的;完全的;[语法]完成的 v.使完美]+ion表名词→n.尽善尽美,完美
af使+fect做,制作→使……做→影响
con共同+fect做,制作→很多[果子,甜品]加在一起做→调制[出糖果]
dis分开+affect感情→感情分开→疏远
ef出+fect做,制作→做出来→出效果
effect[n.结果;效果;影响;印象 v.招致;实现;达到]+u+ate表动词→v.实行,完成
in进入+fect做,制作→做进去→传染进去
per全部+fect做,制作→全部做完→完善的

Sentence.sentence: Complaining in person or by letter is generally more effective.
social life provides an effective cure for illness
Find more effective drugs for them.
Americans now attach more importance to the effective use of time.
Thus, my IDP will be most effective when it's embedded in larger career-development efforts
It is an effective tool of self-assessment and introspection for better career plans.

sentences.en: The medicine is effective against cancer.
Her brother is the king, but she is the effective ruler.
sentences.cn: 她的兄弟是国王, 但她才是实际的主宰者。

sentences.en: The book has a very effective closing chapter.
sentences.cn: 这本书的结尾一章给人印象极深。

jushi.english: The book has a very effective closing chapter.
jushi.chinese: 这本书的结尾一章给人印象极深。

jushi.english: Her brother is the king, but she is the effective ruler.
jushi.chinese: 她的兄弟是国王,但她才是实际的主宰者。

jushi.english: The medicine is an effective cure for a headache.
